message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value of this product. Could we meet halfway at $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
